ing: 4 fluid ounces Puerto Rican white rum
des: "This is a refreshing summer drink you can enjoy all year long. My husband and I love to have one every day after working out at the gym! Be sure to use fresh lemon juice!"
ins: Place 4 ice cubes in each 6-ounce glass.  Pour 2 ounces of Puerto Rican white rum in each glass.  Squeeze the juice of 1/4 of lemon in each glass.  Pour in 3 ounces of cranberry juice. Stir.
